Provide call and chat support across Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Website Live Chat, and WhatsApp. Respond to customer queries, complaints, and requests promptly. Collect and record customer feedback. Maintain records of orders, deliveries, and return entries. Keep the customer database updated and organized. Assist with stock monitoring and ensure proper inventory status. Deliver an excellent customer experience with a positive and solution-focused approach. Skills & Expertise Call Center Call Support Customer Care Customer Handling Customer Service Customer Service Management Customer Support through Phone E-Commerce products Facebook Post Google Sheets Suggested by Call Center Operation Customer Handling Customer Relations Social Media Management Compensation & Other Benefits Performance bonus Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 - Free lunch, evening snacks - Unlimited tea/coffee - 2 yearly bonuses - Salary review every year Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Uttara) Company Information babai Follow Address: Domino building, House 6, Lift 6, Flat B , Rabindro Sarani Road, Sector 7, Uttara. ( beside City Bank Azompur Branch) Website: https://www.babai.com.bd/ Business: Babai is a growing e-commerce brand from Bangladesh, dedicated to offering high-quality products at affordable prices. We operate fully online, making shopping simple, fast, and reliable for customers across the country.
